Posts.Content: I had my bilateral reconstruction DIEP Flap done there 3 years ago after breast cancer surgery. This is an excellent group. Highly skilled, highly compassionate, recognizes that each person is an individual and handles things differently. I had a very good experience and still see them periodically. I have no cons. Come prepared to ask questions. They make every effort to make sure you are comfortable with your decision.
Posts.Title: Has anyone used PRMA Plastic Surgery in TX?

Posts.Content: I also want to add that Dr. Nastala did my surgery and I am more than pleased with my outcome.
